name: Island Survival Disaster
description:
You are on a unknown island, with a group of survivors that also wants to return home. It will be as easy as waiting on the beach for a rescue or will you have to shake the whole island to get out without dying?

-Manage your resources and the survivors
-Explore the island, and found interesting places. The map is random!
-Score the highest score leaving the island with the maximum number of survivors
-Games based on events and text. Turn based.

Featuring music by Matthew Pablo (http://www.matthewpablo.com)
